title: Philippe Gilbert and Loïc Vliegen Convicted of Assault of Driver Who ‘Dangerously’ Overtook Them
content:
Gilbert was also convicted for carrying pepper spray, while the driver was punished for 'intentionally' obstructing traffic.

Read the full article at Philippe Gilbert and Loïc Vliegen Convicted of Assault of Driver Who ‘Dangerously’ Overtook Them on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
